summary: A few Of my Goddess bodyslide presets for use with CBBE
descriptionHtml:
sevrel diffrent body slide presets for [color=#ff0000][size=4][b]CBBE[/b][/size][/color]. The first Uses cbbe and bodyslide and requires nothing else. I got this look primarily by giving the torso a size of -70, providing a more feminine and busty look. The second, Goddess LUX, makes use of the expanded slider sets obtained thru the [color=#ff0000]Luxury Clothing Collection[/color] from lovers lab. This amazing clothing and armor pack adds some [color=#ff0000]great new sliders that make use of elements from other body types such as 7 base, ADM, and BBE2[/color]. Just follow the instructions when installing the Lux mod and the Goddess Lux preset will make use of these expanded sliders to achieve what you see in my pics labled "Goddess Lux". However, the[color=#ff0000] Luxury mod IS NOT REQUIRED[/color] for the Lux preset to work. Without the clothing mod you will just end up with a thicker version of my original without the amplified breasts. And for those of you who enjoy some extra curves where it counts, you may wish to try my [color=#00ff00]Extra Thick Edition[/color] which at a weight of 0 gives you the standard goddess form while 100 will provide phenomenal curves. 
[color=#00ffff][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]REQUIRES CBBE BODYSLIDE[/url][/size][/color]

[color=#ff0000]INSTALATION:
[/color][color=#ffff00]Do not use NMM[/color]. Just open the rar and drop the xml. file into your bodyslide preset folder.
[color=#ff0000]If you do not see the sliderset[/color] called Goddess [color=#ff0000]select the standard cbbe nude body as your outfit[/color] and you will see it as an option.
Then select save preset and select all of your armors you would like to see it used on. 

[size=4][url=http://www.loverslab.com/topic/51192-luxury-collection-for-cbbe-hdt-bodyslide/]LUXURY CLOTHING MOD

[/url][/size][color=#00ff00]Items Used in pics:
[/color][size=2]Charming High Heels for CBBE HDT by arison_c 
Minou Maid Bikini
Fair Skin Complextion
TM Ball gown bbp
Luxury clothing mod
Various other jewelry and clothing mods. 

[/size]
author: Pkco2
